snippet: Artists and galleries are collaborating on several projects, including a series of upcoming exhibitions in India.
abstract: Artists and galleries are collaborating on several projects, including a series of upcoming exhibitions in India.
lead_paragraph: “It has taken well over sixty years, but after a traumatic divorce that unraveled an empire, India and Britain now seem to be having some kind of cultural honeymoon,” Gayatri Rangachari Shah wrote in The International Herald Tribune.

headline.main: India and Britain Deepen Their Artistic Links
